Interview Spreads

Applications:

  • Get to know a new tarot deck
  • Inquire about a new object that you want to bring into the household (like a job interview)

Questions:

  1. Tell me about yourself
  2. What are your strengths?
  3. What are your weaknesses?
  4. What can I learn from you?
  5. How can I best work with you?
  6. What will come out of our relationship?
